title: Upama
plot: Appu, an orphan who is mentally challenged but closely attached to mother nature. There's a twist of fate for both Appu and the villagers when a group of youngsters organize a treasure hunt game in the village.

synopsis: Appu is a mentally challenged person, who is living in a village named as Kaavumpuram. He is an orphan and strongly attached with mother nature. There is a certain kinds of mysteries around the village. Upama is a tale, that is happening with the arrival of a group of youngsters. There is a twist over the life of Appu and villagers after the entry of gang. The treasure hunting game is starting from that instant. The fate of villagers and Appu are leading to a mouse and cat play. Many kinds of incidents are happening continuous manner with the actions of each characters within this story. Nature is also playing a big role throughout the tale and river is acting as a twist element at a point, it is really the turning point of stream of incidents. The reality is hiding by the gang and they are just establishing there own agenda over the poor people. A few guys are only identifying the truth, but their own positive intentions are blocked by the threatening groups themselves. But the plan of nature is proving the greatness and strength of truth at the right time. At the same time, gang was under wrong track due to their negative intentions and they are not identifying the trap of fate. Poor village people are not identifying reality and drama is carrying out in front of them. The treasure hunt is leading to some kinds of horrible incidents and its impact is totally changing the conditions of village and life of people. Appu is leaded to another one phase of his life with the help and care of mother nature, but that poor guy is not identifying the truth behind it. He is moving ahead like an innocent child within the safe hands of mother.
